TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit IisTraceListener extends System.Diagnostics.TraceListener

Docs.summary: Provides a listener that routes all tracing and debugging output to the [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The IisTraceListener class connects the tracing mechanism of [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] to [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. This listener class enables developers who create [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/add/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] applications and who implement the <xref:System.Web.IHttpModule> and <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> interfaces to raise page-level, module-level, or handler-level events to the [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure when tracing is enabled.
> [!NOTE] > This listener class does not route [!INCLUDE[iisver](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] events to ASP.NET classes. This includes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class and classes that implement the <xref:System.Web.IHttpModule> or <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> interface.
IisTraceListener is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks IisTraceListener is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public override void TraceData (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int id, object data);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void TraceData(class System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, valuetype System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int32 id, object data) cil managed

Docs.param: A object that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
A name that identifies the output. This is typically the name of the application that generated the trace event.
A value that specifies the type of event that caused the trace.
A numeric identifier for the event.
The trace data to write.
Docs.summary: Writes trace information, a data object, and event information to the output of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. The members of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource?displayProperty=fullName> classes use this method to write trace data.
TraceData is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public override void TraceData (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int id, object[] data);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void TraceData(class System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, valuetype System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int32 id, object[] data) cil managed

Docs.param: A object that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
A name that identifies the output. This is typically the name of the application that generated the trace event.
A value that specifies the type of event that caused the trace.
A numeric identifier for the event.
An array of objects to write as data.
Docs.summary: Writes trace information, an array of data objects, and event information to the output of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. The members of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource?displayProperty=fullName> classes use this method to write trace data.
TraceData is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public override void TraceEvent (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType severity, int id, string message);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void TraceEvent(class System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, valuetype System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType severity, int32 id, string message) cil managed

Docs.param: A object that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
A name that identifies the output. This is typically the name of the application that generated the trace event.
A value that specifies the type of event that caused the trace.
A numeric identifier for the event.
A message to write.
Docs.summary: Writes trace and event information to the output of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. The members of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource?displayProperty=fullName> classes use this method to write trace data.
TraceEvent is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public override void TraceEvent (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType severity, int id, string format, object[] args);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void TraceEvent(class System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, valuetype System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType severity, int32 id, string format, object[] args) cil managed

Docs.param: A object that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.
A name that identifies the output. This is typically the name of the application that generated the trace event.
A value that specifies the type of event that caused the trace.
A numeric identifier for the event.
A format string that contains zero or more format items that correspond to objects in the `args` array.
An object array that contains zero or more objects to format.
Docs.summary: Writes trace information, a formatted array of objects, and event information to the output of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is not intended to be called directly by application code. The members of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.Debug?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Diagnostics.Trace?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Diagnostics.TraceSource?displayProperty=fullName> classes use this method to write trace data.
TraceEvent is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Write(string message) cil managed

Docs.param: The message to write.
Docs.summary: Writes the specified message to the output of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Write is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Write (string message, string category);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Write(string message, string category) cil managed

Docs.param: The message to write.
Ignored. The implementation of the class disregards the `category` parameter.
Docs.summary: Writes the specified message and the specified category name to the output of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This overload of the <xref:System.Web.IisTraceListener.Write%2A> method is provided for compatibility. This method does not use any values passed in the `category` parameter.
Write is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteLine(string message, string category) cil managed
